text: Hildesheim is a district (Landkreis) in Lower Saxony, Germany. It is surrounded by the districts of Hanover, Peine, Wolfenbüttel, Goslar, Northeim, Holzminden and Hamelin-Pyrmont. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website *360° Panoramas Hildesheim *Article about Hildesheim *Pictures
title: Hildesheim (district)
